outline:
1. to lift up, cast up, exalt
    1. (Qal)
      1. to cast up a highway
      2. to cast up a way
      3. to lift up (of song)
    2. (Pilpel) to exalt, esteem highly, prize
    3. (Hithpoel) to exalt oneself
kjv_def: cast up, exalt (self), extol, make plain, raise up.
strongs_def: to mound up (especially a turnpike); figurative, to exalt; reflexively, to oppose (as by a dam)
